sentences.en: An apparently blind alley leads suddenly into an open space.
an assignment that is right up your alley.
sentences.cn: 一项正好让你去发挥才能的任务

sentences.en: Each front door looks across a narrow alley to the front door opposite.
sentences.cn: 家家大门对大门，中间隔着一条窄巷。

sentences.en: Everyone wanted to bowl, hence everyone wanted to open a bowling alley.
sentences.cn: 大家都想玩保龄球，因此大家都想开保龄球馆。

sentences.en: He was all attention in an instant. The alley door closed softly.
sentences.cn: 他立即全神贯注地听着, 小巷的门轻轻关上.

sentences.en: He wheeled his bike into the alley at the side of the house.
sentences.cn: 他把自行车推进了房子旁的小巷中。

sentences.en: Huck stood sentry and Tom felt his way into the alley.
sentences.cn: 哈克放哨,汤姆摸着进了巷子.

sentences.en: I was ready to sly out the alley door.
sentences.cn: 我准备从那边小门溜出去.

sentences.en: She found the side alley where the stage door was located.
sentences.cn: 她找到了剧场后门所在的小巷。

sentences.en: The alley led to the railway bridge.
The blind alley ended in a brick wall.
sentences.cn: 这条死胡同的尽头是砖墙.

sentences.en: The centre of the city is full of tiny intersecting alley-ways.
sentences.cn: 市中心到处是纵横交错的小巷道。

sentences.en: The job is right down your alley.
sentences.cn: 这个工作正适合你的才能.

sentences.en: The line of reasoning will only lead you up another blind alley.
sentences.cn: 那种推理方法只会把你引进另一条死胡同.

sentences.en: The side alley was walled off from the back garden.
sentences.cn: 侧巷和后花园之间用墙隔开了。

sentences.en: The thugs jumped him in a dark alley.
sentences.cn: 在黑巷里歹徒们突然攻击他.

sentences.en: We live in the same alley.
sentences.cn: 我们住在同一条小巷里.

phrases.tran_cn: 单打端线和双打端线之间的细长地带
死胡同；没有前途的职业
保龄球馆；球戏场；滚球槽
相称，合口味：与某人的兴趣或才能相称的
见 street 条 up one's street

trans.tran_en: a narrow street between or behind buildings, not usually used by cars
